name: Push-Up
description: A basic push-up strengthens the chest, shoulders, and triceps.

name: Pull-Up
description: Pull-ups build upper body strength using body weight.

name: Squat
description: A fundamental leg exercise targeting the quads and glutes.

name: Plank
description: An isometric exercise that builds core endurance.

name: Dumbbell Curl
description: A classic arm exercise for strengthening the biceps.

name: Lunges
description: Targets the quads, hamstrings, and glutes with a single-leg movement.

name: Overhead Press
description: Works the deltoids and triceps through a vertical pressing motion.

name: Tricep Dips
description: Bodyweight exercise focused on triceps activation.

name: Russian Twist
description: A rotational movement to strengthen obliques and abdominals.

name: Mountain Climbers
description: High-intensity movement to elevate heart rate and work the entire body.
